column4: hi folks, I have a fresh installation of 10.4 and no longer have a terminal beep, i.e. when autocomplete fails to find a unique match or when I get an email in Tbird.
I would assume you would have to pop some code in to the blacklist files
and Slart: thanks for the lead -- I'll look into it right away. Many thanks y'all!
No proble I like to help[
